title: Grace Alele-Williams
summary: Grace Alele-Williams  OON, FMAN, FNAE (16 December 1932 â€“ 25 March 2022) was a Nigerian professor of mathematics education,[1][2] who made history as the first Nigerian woman to receive a doctorate,[3][4] and the first Nigerian female vice-chancellor at the University of Benin.[5][6][7]
